overview:
Shawn Layden is Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer, Sony Network Entertainment, responsible for strategic business development and management, and network retail operations.

Mr. Layden joined Sony Network Entertainment from Sony Computer Entertainment (SCE), where he most recently held the position of President, Sony Computer Entertainment Japan. His 14 year career at Sony Computer Entertainment included eight years at SCE’s London Studio where he managed international software development. Mr. Layden joined Sony Corporation’s corporate communications department in 1987 in Tokyo, Japan, and worked for several years as assistant to Sony founder and Chairman, Akio Morita.
